::KitKat::

She jumped up as Terrorsaur flew next to her. She looked around for a 
moment. She looked at her leg laying there in front of her.  She was 
about to cry.  She didn't know why, but she felt the tears well up in 
her eyes.
"Yes, that's it." She looked at it. It wasn't to badly damaged. She 
looked at Terrorsaur.  "Thank you so much." A single tear ran down 
her cheek.
She looked at Drillbit, "What do I have to do to have it back on me 
again?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Talon Harvilicz <talon_the_rider@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Terrorsaur:
>  
> 
> Terrorsaur made it back to the Predacon cave, and without any 
confrontation. He flew inside with the arm in his claws and flew 
quickly over to KitKat. "I got it! Is this it?" He placed it on the 
ground and landed.
>
